trans-unit.source: Provides helper methods for operations that match string patterns.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos auxiliares para operações de correspondam de padrões de cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Creates a search pattern string where the specified text can have other text before and following it.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cadeia de caracteres de padrão de pesquisa em que o texto especificado pode ter outro texto antes e após a ele.

trans-unit.source: The string to insert into the search pattern string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres para inserir a cadeia de caracteres de padrão de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The character to use to escape wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser usado para substituir caracteres curinga.

trans-unit.source: A search pattern string that contains the specified string and the '%' character before and after it.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de padrão de pesquisa que contém a cadeia de caracteres especificada e o caractere '% s'antes e depois dele.

trans-unit.source: Creates a search pattern string where the specified text can have other text before it but not following it.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cadeia de caracteres de pesquisa padrão onde o texto especificado pode ter outro texto antes, mas não em seguida.

trans-unit.source: The string to insert into the search pattern string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres para inserir a cadeia de caracteres de padrão de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The character to use to escape wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser usado para substituir caracteres curinga.

trans-unit.source: A search pattern string that contains the '%' character followed by the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de padrão de pesquisa que contém o caractere '%' seguido de cadeia de caracteres especificada.

trans-unit.source: Creates a search pattern string where the specified text can have other text after it but not before it.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cadeia de caracteres de padrão de pesquisa em que o texto especificado pode ter outro texto após ele, mas não antes.

trans-unit.source: The string to insert into the search pattern string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres para inserir a cadeia de caracteres de padrão de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The character to use to escape wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser usado para substituir caracteres curinga.

trans-unit.source: A search pattern string that contains the specified string followed by the '%' character.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de padrão de pesquisa que contém a cadeia de caracteres especificada, seguida pelo caractere '% s'.

trans-unit.source: Translates a search pattern for the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_Like" name="Like" href=""></xref> operator to a search pattern for the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LIKE" name="LIKE" href=""></xref> operator.
trans-unit.target: Converte um padrão de pesquisa para o [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_Like" name="Like" href=""> </xref> operador para um padrão de pesquisa para o [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LIKE" name="LIKE" href=""> </xref> operador.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_Like" name="Like" href=""></xref> search pattern to translate to a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LIKE" name="LIKE" href=""></xref> search pattern.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_Like" name="Like" href=""> </xref> padrão de pesquisa para converter para um [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LIKE" name="LIKE" href=""> </xref> padrão de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The character to use to escape special SQL characters or the escape character itself.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser usado para escapar caracteres especiais do SQL ou o caractere de escape.

trans-unit.source: A search pattern for the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LIKE" name="LIKE" href=""></xref> operator that corresponds to the specified [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_Like" name="Like" href=""></xref> search pattern.
trans-unit.target: Um padrão de pesquisa para o [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LIKE" name="LIKE" href=""> </xref> operador que corresponde à especificada [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_Like" name="Like" href=""> </xref> padrão de pesquisa.
